About.Hours & facilities: Open by appointment during office hours. Enquiry service.

About.Access: Minimum 16 years of age. Advance notice of visit and area of interest required.

About.Acquisition focus: In-house (main archive) - Council business records from inception in 1861 until the present. Collecting - there is also a Community Archive containing records of past organisations from the Parramatta area.

About.Major holdings: Council Minute Books; Rate and Valuation Books; Correspondence Registers

About.References:
Jervis, James The Cradle City Of Australia: A History of Parramatta 1788-1961.Parramatta City Council, Parramatta 1961

Kass, Terry; Liston, Carol; McClymont, John Parramatta: A Past Revealed. Parramatta City Council, Parramatta 1996.
